title: Depression and fatigue increase women's risk of work-related injuries

title_detail.value: Depression and fatigue increase women's risk of work-related injuries

summary: Women who suffer from depression, anxiety, and fatigue are more likely to be injured at work, according to a new study. The study found that these health factors significantly affected women's risk of injury but not men's risk.
